item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司本月无法从股东处获得 5 亿英镑资金
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Utilities Ltd.）表示，扭亏为盈计划所需的首批 5 亿英镑新股本将无法如期在 3 月底前到位。【原文：Thames Water Utilities Ltd. said the first £500 million tranche of new equity needed for a turnaround plan will not be provided by the end of the March as anticipated.】

item.title: 随着中澳关系改善，中国取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收关税
item.description: 中国取消了对澳大利亚葡萄酒出口征收的惩罚性关税，这标志着对堪培拉长达三年的贸易施压运动宣告结束，也为这一价值数十亿美元的产业带来了复苏的希望。【原文：China lifted its punitive tariffs on Australia’s wine exports, signaling an end to a three-year campaign of trade pressure on Canberra and raising hopes for a revival of the billion-dollar industry.】

item.title: StanChart 预计流入印度债券的资金将增加 300 亿美元
item.description: 据渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）称，在印度于 6 月份开始被纳入一个主要的全球指数之后，印度的债券市场可能会有多达 300 亿美元的额外资金流入。【原文：India’s bond market will likely see an additional inflow of as much as $30 billion after the nation’s inclusion in a major global index starts in June, according to Standard Chartered Plc.】

item.title: 澳大利亚锂生产商为提高透明度将进行在线销售
item.description: 澳大利亚矿产资源有限公司（Mineral Resources Ltd.）将利用数字交易平台出售含锂矿物--锂辉石精矿，以提高市场透明度。【原文：Australian miner Mineral Resources Ltd. will use a digital trading platform to sell parcels of spodumene concentrate, a lithium-bearing mineral, in an effort to bring transparency to the market.】

item.title: 施瓦茨曼看好私人信贷，称违约率仅为 0.3
item.description: 黑石集团首席执行官 Steve Schwarzman 表示，即使批评者警告该资产类别出现泡沫，私人信贷行业仍将进一步扩张。【原文：Blackstone Chief Executive Officer Steve Schwarzman said the private credit industry will expand further even as critics warn of a bubble developing in the asset class.】

item.title: 习近平关于中国货币工具的旧讲话吸引交易员眼球
item.description: 在一本 172 页的书中，有一句话引用了习近平主席关于国家货币工具的评论，这句话迅速成为股票和债券交易员的热门话题。【原文：A line from a 172-page book citing President Xi Jinping’s comments on the nation’s monetary tools is quickly becoming a hot talking point among stock and bond traders.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国经济增长数据证实 2023 年英国经济将陷入衰退
item.description: 伦敦的商业办公摩天大楼。摄影师：Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg【原文：Commercial office skyscrapers in London. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 阿达尼家族注资 7.99 亿美元，增持 Ambuja 水泥公司股份
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）及其家族注资 7.99 亿美元增持 Ambuja 水泥有限公司的股份，在印度基础设施建设蓬勃发展的背景下，这位商业大亨显示出对水泥业务的信心。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani and his family injected $799 million to increase its stake in Ambuja Cements Ltd. as the business tycoon showed signs of confidence in its cement business amid the country’s infrastructure boom.】

item.title: 中国央行任命 2015 年以来首位女性副行长
item.description: 中国任命了九年来第一位女性央行副行长，这在习近平主席以男性为主导的政府中显得尤为突出。【原文：China appointed the first female deputy chief of the central bank in nine years, a hire that stands out in President Xi Jinping’s male-dominated administration.】

item.title: 假期前香港科技股领涨中概股
item.description: 周四，在香港上市的中国股票大涨，因为投资者在长周末前纷纷涌入权重科技股。【原文：Chinese stocks listed in Hong Kong rallied on Thursday as investors piled into heavyweight tech shares ahead of the long weekend.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注水泥 152，认为美元兑日元走势值得关注
item.description: 日元观察家们指出，1 美元兑 152 日元是受困货币的下一个关键水平，策略师们警告说，突破这一水平将为干预打开大门，而期权定位则有可能加速下跌。【原文：Yen watchers are pointing to 152 per dollar as the next key level for the beleaguered currency, with strategists warning that a breach opens the door to intervention while option positioning threatens to accelerate declines.】

item.title: 达里奥称中国必须解决债务问题 否则将面临 "失去的十年
item.description: 雷-达里奥警告说，中国应削减债务，放宽货币政策，否则将面临 "失去的十年"。【原文：Ray Dalio warned that China should cut its debt and ease monetary policy or face “a lost decade.”】

item.title: 股市熊市为何让人束手无策？
item.description:
对美国经济硬着陆的信念已经破灭。持怀疑态度的人现在可能会预测软着陆，但市场已经做好了不着陆的准备。【原文：

Belief in a hard landing in the US is over. Doubters may now predict a soft one, but markets are positioned for no landing at all.

item.title: 世界顶级铝生产商在几内亚面临原材料供应风险
item.description: 中国铝业股份有限公司（Aluminum Corp. of China Ltd.）表示，该公司认为几内亚铝土矿供应面临的风险 "相对较高"，这凸显出该公司在原材料方面对单一国家的依赖性日益增强。【原文：Aluminum Corp. of China Ltd. said it sees “relatively high” risks to supplies of bauxite from Guinea, highlighting its growing dependence on a single country for the raw material.】

item.title: 加拿大加大对加密货币案中黄金和劳力士的调查力度
item.description: 加拿大省级官员正试图迫使已倒闭的加密货币交易所 QuadrigaCX 的幸存联合创始人解释他是如何获得囤积的现金、45 根金条和包括镶钻劳力士表在内的珠宝的。【原文：Provincial officials in Canada are trying to force the surviving co-founder of defunct crypto exchange QuadrigaCX to explain how he came by a cash hoard, 45 gold bars and jewelry including a diamond-studded Rolex.】

item.title: 中国政策性银行考虑在下一季度加快售债速度
item.description: 中国债券市场最大的发行商之一正考虑在第二季度加快发债速度，此举可能会加剧此前的特别国债销售计划引发的供应担忧。【原文：One of the biggest issuers in China’s bond market is considering accelerating debt issuance in the second quarter, a move that may exacerbate supply concern triggered by earlier plans for special government bond sales.】

item.title: 江西铜业计划提高产量，预计价格将上涨
item.description: 中国最大的铜矿生产商江西铜业股份有限公司表示，预计一旦美联储降息，铜价将在下半年上涨，同时该公司承诺，尽管有人呼吁控制产量，但仍将保持两位数的产量增长。【原文：Jiangxi Copper Co., China’s largest producer, said it expects prices to rise in the second half once the Federal Reserve cuts interest rates, while pledging to maintain double-digit growth in output despite calls to rein in production.】

item.title: 新加坡在巴西贿赂案中起诉胜科海事前首席执行官
item.description: 胜科海事前首席执行官被指控贿赂巴西官员数百万美元，以促进新加坡公司在南美国家的利益。【原文：Sembcorp Marine’s former CEO was accused of bribing Brazilian officials millions of dollars to advance the Singapore company’s interests in the South American country.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Astignes 为新战略寻求数亿美元资金
item.description: Astignes Capital Asia Pte 从 4 月份开始向外部投资者开放新的 Astignes Systematic RV Macro Fund，寻求潜在的数亿美元资金。【原文：Astignes Capital Asia Pte is opening the new Astignes Systematic RV Macro Fund to outside investors starting in April, seeking potentially hundreds of millions of dollars, said people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行历史性一周：日本债券创 14 个月来最大流出量
item.description: 上周，由于日本央行 17 年来首次上调短期政策利率，日本债券遭遇了一年多来最严重的外国投资者抛售。【原文：Japanese bonds suffered the heaviest selling by foreign investors in more than a year last week, as the country’s central bank raised its short-term policy rate for the first time in 17 years.】

item.title: 日本市场面临复活节财政年度结束的风险
item.description: 随着日本财政年度接近尾声，全球许多市场正因复活节而关闭，日本货币、股票和债券面临的风险也在增加，而此时距离日本央行加息还不到两周时间。【原文：The risks are piling up for Japan’s currency, stocks and bonds as the nation’s fiscal year draws to an end right when many global markets close for Easter — and less then two weeks after the central bank hiked interest rates.】

item.title: 中国房地产危机波及最大银行
item.description: 中国房地产的长期低迷正在侵蚀中国最大国有银行的资产负债表，其不良贷款率也在不断攀升。【原文：China’s protracted property downturn is eroding the balance sheets of the nation’s largest state banks as their bad loan ratios are creeping up.】

item.title: 财报不佳，中国股市抹去三月涨幅
item.description: 中国股市抹去了 3 月份的涨幅，原因是财报令人失望，打压了市场情绪，加剧了人们对政策推动的涨势将进一步放缓的担忧。【原文：Chinese stocks erased their gains for March as earnings disappointments weighed down on sentiment, fueling concern that more of the policy-driven rally will unwind.】

item.title: 马克龙敦促巴西企业 "更加相信 "法国
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统正邀请巴西公司加强在法国的投资，以寻求国际合作伙伴关系的多样化。【原文：President Emmanuel Macron is inviting Brazilian companies to step up investment in France as he seeks to diversify international partnerships.】

item.title: 悉尼银行股有望创三年来最佳季度业绩
item.description: 澳大利亚银行股将创下自 2021 年以来的最大季度涨幅，但这一涨势可能会在未来几个月内经受考验，因为较低的官方利率会对利润前景造成压力。【原文：Australian bank shares are headed for their biggest quarterly gain since 2021, a rally that may be tested in coming months as lower official interest rates weigh on the outlook for margins.】

item.title: 中国债券热潮在最佳回报结束的担忧中消退
item.description: 中国政府债券连续五个月的强劲反弹似乎将在本月终结，因为避险买盘受到了第二季度债务发行量增加和人民币走软预期的威胁。【原文：A fizzing five-month rally in Chinese government bonds looks set to end this month, as the haven buying spree comes under threat from expectations of higher debt issuance in the second quarter and a weaker yuan.】

item.title: 降息预期升温，英国房屋销售商削减折扣
item.description: 由于对今年降息的预期不断升温，英国房屋销售商提供的折扣越来越小，从而刺激了需求。【原文：UK home sellers are offering smaller discounts as rising expectations of interest-rate cuts this year boost demand.】

item.title: 对冲成本上升，全球基金对亚洲新兴市场债券的投资降温
item.description: 由于对冲成本的上升侵蚀了收益，外国投资者对亚洲新兴债券的态度开始变得谨慎。【原文：Foreign investors are turning cautious on emerging Asian bonds as the rising cost of hedging eats into returns.】

item.title: 野村的 Willcox 称日元今年可能飙升至 1 美元兑 140 日元
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. expects the yen to strengthen against the dollar later this year, according to the firm’s head of trading and investment banking.】
